name: Now Contact Detail Template
summary: Learn about .DTL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create the DTL file, select Define → Print Templates → Contact Details..., select the "+" button in the top-right, name the template, and click OK. You can then edit the template layout and its dimensions. Click OK when you're finished.
To select the template you want to print from, select File → Print Templates..., choose your template, and click OK.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
